com.nokia.midp.examples.network.push
Class ConnectMIDlet

java.lang.Object
  javax.microedition.midlet.MIDlet
      com.nokia.midp.examples.network.push.ConnectMIDlet
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.microedition.lcdui.CommandListener, java.lang.Runnable
public class ConnectMIDlet
extends javax.microedition.midlet.MIDlet
implements javax.microedition.lcdui.CommandListener, java.lang.Runnable

Supplies a MIDlet with a mechanism to create a connection to a desired address.

run

public void run()
Defines the run() method which all Runnable objects must do. Creates a SocketConnection to the address appearing in the TextField on the screen.

Specified by:
run in interface java.lang.Runnable
